events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under refund due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item.
Assigning the refund case to agent Alice for resolution and follow up with the customer.
Hello! I'm Alice from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I'll help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is the photo showing the incorrect item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will wait for the refund to arrive.
The refund has been processed on our end. Please contact us if you do not receive it within the next 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund successfully and that everything is now resolved.
As we have not heard back and your refund has been delivered, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting us.
